line.text: O truant Muse what shall be thy amends
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For thy neglect of truth in beauty dyed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Both truth and beauty on my love depends
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So dost thou too and therein dignified
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Make answer Muse wilt thou not haply say
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Truth needs no colour with his colour fixed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Beauty no pencil beauty truth to lay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But best is best if never intermixed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Because he needs no praise wilt thou be dumb
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Excuse not silence so fort lies in thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To make him much outlive a gilded tomb
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And to be praised of ages yet to be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then do thy office Muse I teach thee how
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To make him seem long hence as he shows now
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
